TestCase.TestCaseObjective: Verify correct exchange behavior when creating recursive Overlays
TestCase.TestCaseScenario: Nation A creates recursive Overlays. Nation B receives the information.
TestCase.TestCaseEnvironment: Internet or Co-locates. Exchange Pattern: R/R, P/S
TestCase.TestCasePreCondition: Nation A has created a topic. Nation B has subscribed to this topic.
TestCase.TestCaseConclusion: This test is considered a success if the recursive Overlays are displayed correctly on both Nationsâ€™ C2IS.

TestCaseStep.TestCaseStepAction: Nation A creates a recursive Overlay.
TestCaseStep.TestCaseStepResult: Nation B displays the data correctly
